BR Ambedkar Development Corporation has launched the Prerana scheme. \nThe objective of this program is to encourage women from urban and rural areas to set up self-help groups and help them to set up a productive business and turn them profitably. Financial assistance will be extended to the Scheduled Tribe women members of the Self-help groups to engage them in income-generating activities \nFinancial aid will be provided to a self-help group of ten women.
